articles.title: Environment Minister Bhupendra Yadav among 7 tasked with moving the needle at COP30
articles.description: Climate talks in Belem shift to political discussions as ministers arrive to steer negotiations. Key areas like technology transfer, adaptation finance, and mitigation are being guided by ministerial pairs. Brazil's presidency aims for a package of outcomes, highlighting convergence on several agenda items despite differing options.

articles.title: Drones dispatching hair-loss drugs, Ozempic and steroids to prisons
articles.description: Charlie Taylor, the chief inspector of prisons, has warned that the service is struggling to keep up with drone technology — and it could lead to escapes
articles.content: Taylor has previously said that drones have become so advanced that they can carry packages of up to 10kg and could be used to smuggle guns, explosives and other weapons into jails. He also warned that they could soon be used to facilitate a prison e... [3409 chars]

articles.title: ConnectM Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results: 45% Revenue Growth and Continued Balance Sheet Deleveraging
articles.description: MARLBOROUGH, Mass., Nov. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ConnectM Technology Solutions, Inc. (OTC: CNTM) ('ConnectM” or the 'Company”), a constellation of technology-driven businesses powering the modern energy economy, today reported financial results for the three and nine months ended September 30, 2025, following the Company’s filing of its Quarterly Report on Form 10-Q with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on November 17, 2025.

articles.title: Nvidia CEO drops half-trillion forecast - Wall Street can’t wait for earnings report
articles.description: Nvidia is seeing huge demand for its AI chips, and investors are waiting for new earnings to understand the companys future growth. The CEO has shared big numbers that show strong interest in Nvidias next-generation technology. Analysts expect more updates on sales, AI spending, and major partnerships. Wall Street wants to know how fast Nvidia can grow in 2026.
